Uses of Package
eddy.lang

  • Packages that use eddy.lang 
    Package Description
    eddy.lang
    Provides classes to compose Eddy policy objects.
    eddy.lang.analysis
    Provides classes to perform Eddy policy analysis.
    eddy.lang.net
    Provides classes to share Eddy policies over a network.
    eddy.lang.parser
    Provides classes to parse and compile Eddy policies.
  • Classes in eddy.lang used by eddy.lang 
    Class and Description
    Action
    Describes a mapping from the action name to Role objects.
    Actor
    Describes an actor category, which is a RoleValue in a Role.
    Datum
    Describes a data category, which is a RoleValue in a Role.
    Policy
    Describes a Policy comprised on Rule objects and Type definitions.
    Purpose
    Provides a purpose category, which is a RoleValue in a Role.
    Role
    Describes a mapping from a Action to a RoleValue.
    Role.Type
    Describes the type of the role.
    RoleValue
    Provides a Visitor Pattern interface to the value of a Role
    RoleValueSet
    Describes a logical relation between one or more RoleValue objects.
    RoleValueSet.BinarySet
    Describes a generic set of two RoleValueSet objects.
    RoleValueSet.Complement
    Describes the set complement of two RoleValueSet objects.
    RoleValueSet.Intersect
    Describes the set intersection of two RoleValueSet objects.
    RoleValueSet.Singleton
    Describes the set containing one RoleValueSet object.
    RoleValueSet.Type
    Describes the logical set type.
    RoleValueSet.Union
    Describes the set union of two RoleValueSet objects.
    RoleValueVisitor
    Provides the Visitor pattern for RoleValue classes.
    Rule
    Describes a rule, consisting of a Rule.Modality and Action object.
    Rule.Modality
    Describes the modality of a Rule.
    Type
    Describes a conceptual relationship between two or more RoleValues.
  • Classes in eddy.lang used by eddy.lang.analysis 
    Class and Description
    Action
    Describes a mapping from the action name to Role objects.
    Datum
    Describes a data category, which is a RoleValue in a Role.
    Policy
    Describes a Policy comprised on Rule objects and Type definitions.
    Role.Type

    Rule
